paragraphs.text: Book Two: Spirits (神靈) is the second book of The Legend of Korra, created by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko, following Book One: Air. The nomenclature refers to the focus of the season, a conflict involving the Spirit World.

paragraphs.body: The book debuted on television on September 13, 2013, with a ${link_0} followed by the first two episodes, though the opening episode, "${link_1}", was originally shown to San Diego Comic-Con attendees on July 19, 2013. Spanning fourteen episodes, Book Two concluded on November 22 of the same year. The book also features a two-part special titled "${link_2}", which explores the background of the first ${link_3}, ${link_4}. It is followed by ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: The book debuted on television on September 13, 2013, with a recap of the first book followed by the first two episodes, though the opening episode, "Rebel Spirit", was originally shown to San Diego Comic-Con attendees on July 19, 2013. Spanning fourteen episodes, Book Two concluded on November 22 of the same year. The book also features a two-part special titled "Beginnings", which explores the background of the first Avatar, Wan. It is followed by Book Three: Change.

paragraphs.body: Book Two was released on DVD and Blu-ray box sets on July 1, 2014.
paragraphs.text: Book Two was released on DVD and Blu-ray box sets on July 1, 2014.
